text: Muhammad Mohsin Siddiqui was a Pakistani politician and businessman who was the founder of Pakland Cement. He was the member of the Senate of Pakistan from 1985 to 1990. Siddiqui was murdered in 1990 following ethnic clash during 1988 Hyderabad, Sindh massacre. ==References== Category:1990 deaths Category:Members of the Senate of Pakistan Category:Pakistani company founders Category:Pakistani industrialists Category:Muhajir people Category:People from Karachi Category:Assassinated Pakistani people Category:Muttahida Qaumi Movement politicians
title: Mohsin Siddiqui
